segments.text: I'm looking closely at the details of this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drawing is quite precise, even down to the simple cabinet pulls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spilling from the sink is really quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just pouring over the edge in a continuous, unsightly sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of clean water just being wasted like that is irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's foot is completely submerged in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must feel squishy and cold, yet she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The idea of standing in cold, possibly dirty, overflow water is quite unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness seeping into her dress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess on the floor and cabinets is really starting to accumulate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a rather unhygienic situation, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of neglect is hard to observe without feeling some strong emotion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels a bit chaotic and unkempt due to the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR
